alert.note: Alert for Lower Rio Grande Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Southwest Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 25 at 2:12PM MST until February 26 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 8 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. Locally higher gusts possible across the high peaks of the Southwest Mountains. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, Southwest Mountains, Lower Rio Grande Valley, and San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 8 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles on north to south oriented roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized areas of blowing snow or blowing dust may reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Lower Rio Grande Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Southwest Mountains
